SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Disable tracking
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Completely disable station tracking. Useful for vacations, winter, or long periods where the app shouldn't start tracking when biking is detected

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Colors on station markers
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Show the color of the station marker based on the availability of bikes

SeekBarPreference.android:title: Load responsiveness
SeekBarPreference.android:summary: How responsive the UI will be while loading the markers. 0 responsiveness means that all the markers will be loaded and color coded before even displayed the map. Might take a few seconds

SeekBarPreference.android:title: Period between station updates
SeekBarPreference.android:summary: While in tracking mode, how often should the application update station data (in seconds)
